heading: HR01073
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ARBITRARY EXCLUSION OF MARY JOY TABAL, PHILIPPINE MARATHONER, AS WELL AS ALL OTHERS WHO MAY BE SIMILARLY SITUATED, FROM THE PHILIPPINE DELEGATION TO THE 29TH SOUTHEAST ASIAN GAMES IN KUALA LUMPUR

FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ARBITRARY EXCLUSION OF MARY JOY TABAL, PHILIPPINE MARATHONER, AS WELL AS ALL OTHERS WHO MAY BE SIMILARLY SITUATED, FROM THE PHILIPPINE DELEGATION TO THE 29TH SOUTHEAST ASIAN GAMES IN KUALA LUMPUR
